title: antaram maNanda malar antarangam
sahitya:
antaran maNanda malar antarangam vandu vandu AnandamAi maNakkudEDi en cintaiyum mayakkudEDi
AdiyilE uravAnadin phalanO Ayiram kOTi taru phalanOnIti ariyAda nenju ninaivADi niddiraiyil varu cittiram tAnO


anupallavi

  shendaLam shiranda tirinda annamE dEvAdi dEvanai ariyAyO munnamE 
sindUram shiranda marakatam kANum innamE sEdiyidu tUdu shenru varuvAi en munnamE
					(madhyamakAla)
tighazhoLi makarak-kuzhaiyadum ADum shevvari paranda vizhimunaik-kUDum 
tiritarum aru pada vaLiyishai pOloru dEvarum gAnak-kuzhalishai Udum
attaruNam un manam Anandam kUDum AnandamAna manam tALamum pODum
AnAlum en shol maranduviDak-kUDum AdalAl shonnEnavar kAdilE pODum


caraNam    ninaittAlum nenjam ArAdu peNNE nEril vandAlanri mArAdu shonnEn
Anaittulagum AkkuvAn kAppAn azhippAn AnAlum idu oru bhAramO ennE
					(madhyamakAla)
aDaloLi makarak-kuzhaiyadum ADum aruLoLi paranda vizhimunaik-kUDum 
adanoDum arupada vaLi ishai pOloru Angoru paNNaik-kuzhalishai Udum
 attaruNam un manam Anandam kUDum AnandamAna manam tALamum pODum
AnAlum en shol maranduviDak-kUDum AdalAl shonnEnavar kAdil idu pODum
